name: Java tools
description: Installs SDKMan, JDK and optional tools.

javaVersion.description: Installs the specified Java version. Installs the latest Temurin LTS JDK by default. See `sdkman list java` for supported versions identifiers.

mavenVersion.description: Installs the specified Maven version. Default: latest. See `sdkman list maven` for supported versions identifiers.

installIJavaKernel.description: Installs the IJava Jupyter kernel and its dependencies
